articles.author: Travis Fedschun
articles.title: Utah snowboarder killed after triggering 'significant' avalanche that buried him alive
articles.description: A 45-year-old snowboarder was killed Sunday after he triggered an avalanche that buried him under feet of snow, according to officials.
articles.content:
A 45-year-old snowboarder in Utah was killed Sunday after he triggered an avalanche that buried him under several feet of snow, according to officials.
The Utah Avalanche Center said the male snowboarder left Canyons Village in Park City through a backcountr… [+2768 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea Handler pens tribute to Chuy Bravo after his death: 'I’ll never forget the sound of his laughter'
articles.description: Chelsea Handler is paying tribute to her late castmate Chuy Bravo after his untimely death on Sunday.
articles.content:
Chelsea Handler is paying tribute to her late castmate Chuy Bravo after his untimely death on Saturday.
Bravo, best known for his role on “Chelsea Lately,” died suddenly in Mexico City on Saturday after being rushed to the emergency room following a stomach … [+1564 chars]

articles.author: Michael Goodwin
articles.title: Michael Goodwin: Trump will prevail over ‘scalp-hunting’ journalists
articles.description: Ever since Watergate and the fall of Richard Nixon, a not-so-secret appeal of journalism has been the possibility that you, too, could bring down a president.
articles.content:
Ever since Watergate and the fall of Richard Nixon, a not-so-secret appeal of journalism has been the possibility that you, too, could bring down a president. Get a press pass and, presto, you’re another Woodward and Bernstein.

articles.author: Fox News
articles.title: Buffalo Bills fans line up at airport at 2 am in subzero temperatures to greet playoff-bound team
articles.description: The Bills Mafia, their unique fanbase, was keen to show their appreciation for Sean McDermott's team, when they lined up at Buffalo Airport at 2 a.m. in subzero temperatures.
articles.content:
The Buffalo Bills secured their second playoff berth in three seasons on Sunday night with a hard-fought 17-10 victim against the Pittsburgh Steelers.
And the Bills Mafia, their unique and sometimes over-exuberant fanbase, was keen to show their appreciation… [+2172 chars]

articles.title: Hartley and Makridis: Trump's USMCA will create hundreds of thousands of jobs and boost growth
articles.description: Congress should give the American people the Christmas present they deserve: a ratified USMCA that will pave the way for growth in 2020.
articles.content: The Trump administration and congressional Democrats have struck a deal to pass the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement. While partisanship abounds in congressional impeachment hearings and with the impeachment vote likely to occur one day before the USMCA … [+5843 chars]

articles.title: Trey Gowdy: FISA Errors Are Concerning
articles.description: This week, Martha is joined by former Congressman Trey Gowdy to discuss the IG report, the inaccuracies in the FISA applications and more.
